about_the_game:
NB Desktop - Game Display Plug-in Comes

NB Desktop - Game Display Plug-in Comes Show can be set up to dynamically display your eight longest Steam games on the desktop.




The contents include:

Steam's eight longest game shows.

Specific play time display.




Thank you for your support.
